definition: sacrificial objects

to sacrifice/to offer libation to

one full year (e.g. on child's first birthday)/same as 週歲|周岁[zhou1 sui4]

comet from Saturn, traditionally described as yellow/evil omen
to share nuptial cup/(fig.) to get married
